item.title: 1693A. Directional Increase
item.description: é¡Œç›® Codeforces: 1693A: Directional Increase We have an array of length n. Initially, each element is equal to 0 and there is a pointer located on the first element. We can do the following two kinds of operations any number of times (possibly zero) in any order: If the pointer is not on the last element, increase the element the pointer is currently on by 1. Then move it
